DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine long-term safety etanercept adult AS complete study 0881A3-311-EU .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label , Multicentre , Long-Term Extension Study Etanercept Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , multicenter extension study conduct evaluate safety efficacy etanercept treatment adult subject AS complete study 0881A3-311-EU . The study consist open-label treatment period approximately 96 week .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Completed entire 12 week therapy study 0881A3311EU , complete least 8 week therapy return week 12 visit study 0881A3311EU . 2 . Negative serum βHCG pregnancy test baseline ( woman childbearing potential ) . 3 . Sexually active woman childbearing potential use medically acceptable form contraception . Medically acceptable form contraception include oral contraceptive , injectable implantable method , intrauterine device , properly use barrier contraception . Additionally , use condom suggest adjunct method previously address protect sexually transmit disease provide additional protection accidental pregnancy . 4 .
